"ディガーラの鋭角の調達":
"The seasoning I've made from the Windira
horns has been a huge hit! Unfortunately,
I'm almost out.

Since you're going to the Dragon's Altar,
maybe you can gather some Deegalla
horns for me? Have you tried them before?
I think the flavor will be even better!

※Cae de Nv.50+ Deegalla."
